Content.motto1: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
Content.motto2: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin
Content.motto3: Every failure is a new beginning

readingContent: Literary Classics - "One Hundred Years of Solitude", "Dream of the Red Chamber"
Historical Biography - "Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind"
travelContent: Natural Scenery - Hiking in snow mountains, exploring forests
Urban Culture - Tasting cuisine, visiting museums
Photography - Capturing beautiful moments during journeys
Cultural Exchange - Learning about different regional cultures and histories
LeftItem.description: Everyone's interests and hobbies are unique, they shape our personalities and worldviews. I believe maintaining curiosity and an open mind, constantly exploring new things, is the best way to enrich life.

RightItem.description: In addition to reading and traveling, I have many other hobbies. These activities allow me to relax, cultivate creativity, and make many like-minded friends.
musicContent: Pop Music - Independent bands, original soundtracks
Musical Instruments - Self-learning guitar and piano
Live Performances - Attending music festivals and concerts
sportsContent: Running - Morning runs and marathon training
Yoga - Maintaining physical and mental balance
Mountaineering - Challenging myself, enjoying beautiful scenery
